articles.author: Scott Neuman
articles.title: What does Trump mean when he invokes America's 'Manifest Destiny'? - NPR
articles.description: The 19th century term describes the perceived right of Americans to use force or the threat of force to wrest desireable land from the grasp of others.
articles.content: Chances are you haven't heard the term "manifest destiny" since high school history class. That is until President Trump's inaugural address last month, when he used it to call for America to "plant … [+6215 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Wu
articles.title: Gutting USAID threatens billions of dollars for U.S. farms, businesses - The Washington Post
articles.description: U.S. businesses that sold goods and services to USAID are in limbo, including American farms dealing in rice, wheat and soybeans.
articles.content: The Trump administrations efforts to dismantle the U.S. Agency for International Development, which officials have said is intended to rein in wasteful spending, has left American workers in limbo an… [+6433 chars]
